|elevation_m = |area_code = |website = |footnotes = }} 'Abr' (; also known as
'Abz')<ref></ref> is a village in Kharqan Rural District, Bastam District,
Shahrud County, Semnan Province, Iran. At the 2006 census, its population was
1,383, in 355 families.<ref></ref>
